site_name: MAJESTIC WINE WAREHOUSES LTD, 123 GREENWICH SOUTH STREET, GREENWICH, LONDON, SE10 8NX
description: An application submitted under Section 73 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 for a minor material amendment in connection with the planning permission 17/1914/F, dated 19/01/2018 for demolition of existing building and erection of nine flats (comprising 1 x studio, 5 x one bed, 2 x two bed and 1 x three bed) over retail unit, in two/three storeys, with parking to rear and vehicular access off Lindsell Street to allow:- Amendment of Condition 1 (Approved Drawings) to allow alterations to the approved elevations and floor plans and deletion of drawing D0500P1 to remove wheelchair access units; and - Rewording of Condition 2 (Facing Materials) to allow discharge prior to commencement of above ground works; - Rewording of Condition 6 (Noise From Fixed Plant & Equipment) to allow discharge prior to installation; - Rewording of Condition 10b (Carbon Emissions Reduction) to allow discharge prior to commencement of above ground works; - Rewording of Condition 19 (Restriction on Parking Permits for the Future Residential Occupier) to allow discharge prior to occupation; - Rewording of Condition 23b (BREEAM for all non-residential uses) to allow discharge prior to commencement of above ground works. (Amended Description)
